column4: when i try inserting a SD card into my cardreader, linux complains that it can't mount it
let me reinsert it for the rest
automount usually tells you in a little dialog box why it fails if so
the littel dialog box din'dt help
the output from the dialog box would have been more helpful here :)

org.freedesktop.hal.storage.mount-removable no <-- (action, result).
